DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to assess the relative bioavailability of a single dose of dabigatran after concomitant multiple oral administration of dronedarone with the aim to investigate whether and to what extent the P-gp inhibitor dronedarone affects pharmacokinetic parameters of dabigatran when administered to healthy subjects
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With Dabigatran Etexilate and Dronedarone in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
